SourceInformation.Title: MEP Environmental Product Declaration Dataset
SourceInformation.Name: MEP Environmental Product Declaration Dataset

Fragments.Description: The original EPD functional unit was per item at 488kg per item- we have adjusted the functional unit to Mass (dividing the values by 488) to better reflect the dynamic weights of custom air handling units. An air handling unit (AHU) is a unit that helps to maintain indoor temperature and air flow in high quality. For scaling Air Handling Units, look to the individual cut sheet (custom units can weigh up to 4x more than catalog units.)

This was derived from a One Click product for a DN 25mm 3.9kg Air Separator. For scaling Air Separators, see this link: https://www.nationalpumpsupply.com/content/pdf/bell-and-gossett-rolairtrol-installation-guide.pdf
Swegon Ceiling Diffuser 600 (3.53 kg, 595x595mm). The functional unit is per kg, we have scaled by 3.53 to make it per item.

Collective heat-only gas condensing boiler. This EPD's original functional unit was kW (/1000) and was a 187.1 kg boiler. This study is based on  the analysis of 9 collective heat-only gas condensing boilers, representative of the 2017 French market.  For scaling Boilers, look to the individual cut sheet for the Watts of heat output (use conversion factors to watts if necessary.)
Category 6 LSZH LAN Cable
This EPD relates to cable support systems and applies to 1 running metre cable tray system.
The Swegon Parasol comfort modules operate on a basic principle that is closely akin to that of chilled beams - 22.6kg each.

The functional unit described in the EPD was for one ton of chilling capacity  (/3516 (Watts per Ton)). The declaration is based on the PCR document, “Water-cooled chillers,” year 2011. A centrifugal chiller is a machine that removes heat from a liquid via a vaporcompression cycle. The cooled liquid can then be circulated through a heat exchanger to cool air or equipment as required. The chiller utilizes the vaporcompression cycle to chill water and reject the heat collected from the chilled water  plus the heat from the compressor to a second water loop cooled by a cooling  tower.  For scaling Chillers, look to the individual cut sheet for the Watts of output (use conversion factors to watts if necessary.)
Square D brand I-Line circuit breaker power distribution panelboards.

This entry was provided by Quartz 2019 for Steel Conduit- scaling for steel conduit mass by diameter size can be found here: https://taylorwalraven.ca/electrical-metallic-tubing-data-thinwall-conduit.php
This was derived from a One Click product for a Cooling Tower that weighed 3575 kg/unit. For scaling Cooling Towers, look to the individual cut sheet for weight.
OTDC200E-2P is a robust DC Switch Disconnector for upto 1500V DC applications.
OTDC32F3 is a robust DC Switch Disconnector for upto 1500V DC applications. It provides  reliable switching and isolation in a wide variety of applications.
OT400E03 is robust AC Switch Disconnector for upto 690V AC applications. It provides  reliable switching and isolation in a wide variety of applications.
This EPD is for Aluminum Metallic Coated Steel (ALCOT)
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019

External insulation on commercial or residential heating or air conditioning ducts in North America. It is suitable for the exterior of rectangular or round sheet metal ducts and spaces or surfaces where temperature and condensation must be controlled. The original EPD is scaled by the Rsi value of 1, this is R-5.6. Since we typically specify R-8 or higher for ductwork, we have scaled the value by 1.42.

Versatile product for thermal and acoustical applications in North America such as: heating and air conditioning ducts, power and process equipment, boiler and stack installations, metal and masonry walls, wall and roof panel systems, curtain wall assemblies, and cavity walls. The original EPD is scaled by the Rsi value of 1, this is R-5.6. Since we typically specify R-8 or higher for ductwork, we have scaled the value by 1.42.

Specifically designed for sheet metal ducts used in heating, ventilating, and air conditioning in North America. It provides an optimum combination of efficient sound absorption, low thermal conductivity, and minimal airstream surface friction. The original EPD is scaled by the Rsi value of 1, this is R-5.6. Since we typically specify R-8 or higher for ductwork, we have scaled the value by 1.42.
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019

This was derived from a One Click product for a 200L Expansion Tank/Vessel weighing 38.1kg, its functional unit was per kg.  For scaling Expansion Tanks, see this link: https://www.nationalpumpsupply.com/content/pdf/armstrong-series-l-high-pressure-expansion-tank-submittal-sheet.pdf

Carrier 42NH 0.6-12kW Cooling Capacity, 0.8-17kW Heating Capacity. Measured in kW, scaled by 1000 to Watts. For scaling Fan Coil Units, look to the individual cut sheet for the Watts of output (use conversion factors to watts if necessary.)
Sensor activated faucet (not the lavatory basin.)
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019
BAASL Sa
This is for the Wildeboer FK90 fire damper.

The functional unit for this product was per 1kVA, the values have been divided by 1000 to reach VA. For scaling Generators, look to the individual cut sheet for the VA (use conversion factors to VA if necessary.)
Xlerator Hand dryer

This was derived from a One Click product for a Heat Exchanger based on Alfa Laval steel. For scaling Heat Exchangers, see this link: https://www.pvi.com/dfsmedia/0533dbba17714b1ab581ab07a4cbb521/53602-source/csx-instantaneous-single-specification-9066

Fiberglas Pipe Insulation from Owens Corning. The EPD is scaled by mass.
Foamular XPS Insulation from Owens Corning. The original EPD is scaled by the Rsi value of 1, this is R-5.6. This is close to the typical pipe R-values prescribed.

For scaling pipe valves by their size and pressure class see this link: https://www.wermac.org/valves/valves_weights_gate.html
Mallia DP Socket Outlet Switched 2 Gang

This EPD is for a Grundfos Magna3 Circulator Pump. The original functional unit was by item at 6.41kg per item. Each value has been divided by 6.41 to get the functional unit into mass.  For scaling Pumps, look to the individual cut sheet or schedule.
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019
For the purpose of the MEP EPD dataset, this EPD is assumed to have a cross-functional purpose for sprinkler heads. For scaling sprinkler heads, assume a weight of 2oz (0.056699 kg).

The switchgear weight is 407.18 kg, the functional unit is one item. ABB SafeRing Switchgear is a medium voltage gas insulated ring main unit for secondary distribution. The main function of the switchgears is to “establish and cut off the supply of a downstream installation from an electrical and/or mechanical control and to protect people and premises at risk of fire or explosion against insulation defects”. For scaling Generators, look to the individual cut sheet or schedule.
The representative water closet works with 1.1-1.6 GPF or 4.2-6.0 LPF.
The representative urinal works with 0.125-0.5 GPF or 0.5-1.9 LPF.

This is based on the Easy VEC Ultra 2500 m3/hr, average flow of 650 m3/h; 63.54kg. The functional unit is m3/hr, this has been scaled to m3/s (x3600) (1580.4 GWP). For scaling VAVs, look to the individual cut sheet or schedule for the airflows, then convert into m3/s (Revit likely already did the convert into BHoM when pulled.)
PFSP CU up to 6mm2 1 kV with copper conductor. Functional unit 1A over 1km over a 30 year period. We have divided the values by 1000 to achieve per meter values.
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019
